description.p: This event fires before a new record is inserted.

discussion.p: This event allows you to abort the insert if certain conditions have not been met.

section.description: The following variables are available to you in the event:

item.name: Args
item.description: Contains the GridDefinition and rtc variables.

item.name: DataSubmitted
item.description: Contains the changes submitted for the record.

section.description: Your event must set the following variables:

item.name: Result.Cancel
item.description: If .T., the insert record action will be cancelled.

item.name: Result.ErrorHTML
item.description: An HTML error message to display when the event is cancelled.
